msg_404: За съжаление тази страница не съществува.
label_billing_address_text: You can enter a different delivery and billing address here.
label_nbr_of_product_variants: Този продукт се предлага в %s варианти
msg_login_false: There are no matching user data available.
msg_register: Not registered? Here you can register.
msg_edit_psw: Complete these fields only if the password should be changed.
msg_edit_mail: Fill this field only if your e-mail address should be changed. After changing the e-mail address you will automatically receive an activation link sent to your new address.
msg_avatar: Displays a graphic next to each of your posts.
msg_delete_account: Here you can delete your account. Personal information is so irrevocably removed from the database.
msg_register_accept: You must accept the privacy policy.
msg_register_requiredfields: All required fields must be filled.
msg_register_userchars: The specified user name contains too much, not enough or illegal characters
msg_register_existinguser: The specified username is already taken or disallowed.
msg_register_existingusermail: The e-mail address is already taken.
msg_register_mailrepeat_error: The e-mail addresses do not match.
msg_register_success: The user account was created and an activation link to the e-mail address sent.
msg_register_admin_notification_text: A new user account has been created.
msg_confirm_delete_account: Do you really want to delete this user account?
msg_delete_account_success: The user account was removed from the database
msg_delete_account_error: An error has occurred, the account was not deleted.
msg_register_intro: Please fill out the form below. You will receive an email with an activation link you must click to activate your account.
msg_register_outro: Please confirm here that you have read our terms of use and accept it.
msg_update_profile: The user data have been updated
msg_update_profile_error: The user data could not be updated
msg_upload_avatar_filetype: The image must be of type PNG
msg_item_needs_upload: For this item we need a file from you. You can upload the file once the order is completed.
msg_search_undersized: The query must be at least 3 letters long.
msg_forgotten_psw_step1: You can now reset your password. The required activation key was sent to Your e-mail address.
msg_forgotten_psw_step2: Your new password has been sent to your e-mail address.
forgotten_psw_intro: Please enter in the following field the email address of your user account. You will receive an email with the necessary information on how to reset your password.
forgotten_psw_mail_info:
Hello {USERNAME},
You want to reset your password? Just click on the link below.
Please ignore this e-mail if the request to reset your password, is not by you.

Reset your Password:
{RESET_LINK}
forgotten_psw_mail_update:
Hello {USERNAME},
Your password has been reset.

Your new password is:
{temp_psw}
post_is_draft: This entry is a draft. Only administrators can see this entry.
label_mail_helptext: Your email address will not be published
comment_msg_fail: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
comment_msg_auth1: You have to log in to write comments.
comment_msg_auth2: You have to enter your name and your email address.
guestlist_description_for_members: Only registered users can sign the guest list.
label_cart_comment: Add comment or note to your order
msg_accept_terms: You must confirm that you have read and accepted the legal notices and terms.
msg_order_send: Thank you very much! Your order has been sent.
msg_request_send: Thank you very much! Your request was sent.
request_form_intro: Please provide your name and email address so that we can process your request.
msg_missing_mandatory_informations: We need your full postal address to complete the order
msg_missing_user_approval: Your account must be activated by an administrator.
